original_text: And Joseph stored up grain in great abundance, like the sand of the sea, until he ceased to measure it, for it could not be measured.
korean_text: 쌓아 둔 곡식이 바다 모래 같이 심히 많아 세기를 그쳤으니 그 수가 한이 없음이었더라

sentences.original_text: like the sand of the sea
until he ceased to measure it
for it could not be measured
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그것을 측량할 수 없었기 때문이다
